name: gyro-ball
flavor_text:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the moveâ€™s power.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect_text_simple: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
